name: YaBees
description:
YaBees is a strategic combat puzzle game based on a familiar family dice game. You and your hive are under attack - fly out to the flower fields, create your own attacks, and fend off the foes that threaten your beeple! Set yourself up for huge damage and utilize status effects to see how many enemies you can defeat and go for the high score!

  • Build your attacks - use dice to complete sets and runs in the prep phase 
  • Make decisions on what kinds of attacks you bring to combat
  • Strategize your moves and land massive damage or let venom do the work
  • Set combo meter and decide how to best use it while it's high
  • Multiple ways to play! Three different bees each have their own set of abilities 
  • An art style that certainly makes decisions
